com.gotenna.sdk.commands

Class GTCommandCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.commands.GTCommandCenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.gotenna.sdk.interfaces.GTMessageDataListener

    public class GTCommandCenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.gotenna.sdk.interfaces.GTMessageDataListener
    A singleton where all commands to the goTenna are sent from. Use this singleton to send various commands and messages to the goTenna. Created on 2/11/15.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  GTCommandCenter.GTDeleteLastMessageListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an ACK is received from a GET MESSAGE command.
      static interface  GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteErrorListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a group invitation that was sent to a user triggers an error.
      static interface  GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteResponseListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a group invitation that was sent to a user receives a response.
      static interface  GTCommandCenter.GTMessageListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an incoming message is received from the goTenna.
      static interface  GTCommandCenter.GTSystemInfoResponseListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a response is received after sendGetSystemInfo(GTSystemInfoResponseListener, GTErrorListener) is called.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static GTCommandCenter getInstance()
        The shared singleton instance of the GTCommandCenter.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance.

      • setMessageListener

        public void setMessageListener(GTCommandCenter.GTMessageListener gtMessageListener)
        The listener used for receiving all incoming messages from the goTenna. All incoming messages from the goTenna will be passed through to this listener.
        Parameters:
        gtMessageListener - The listener that will receive any incoming messages.

      • sendEchoCommand

        public void sendEchoCommand(com.gotenna.sdk.commands.GTCommand.GTCommandResponseListener responseListener,
                   GTErrorListener errorListener)
        Sends an echo command to the connected goTenna. Upon receiving an echo the goTenna's LED will flash. No actual message is transmitted when an echo is sent.
        Parameters:
        responseListener - The response listener callback for the command.
        errorListener - The error listener callback for the command.

      • setGoTennaGID

        public void setGoTennaGID(long gid,
                 java.lang.String username,
                 GTErrorListener errorListener)
        Sends the SET GID command to the goTenna. This GID will act as the goTenna's ID. Anyone wishing to communicate with this goTenna will need to send a message to this specific GID. Updates the UserDataStore with the user's new GID and username. Will create a new User if one does not exist already.
        Parameters:
        gid - The GID to assign to the goTenna.
        username - The name of the user who's GID this is.
        errorListener - The error listener callback for the command.

      • setGoTennaGID

        public void setGoTennaGID(long gid,
                 java.lang.String username,
                 com.gotenna.sdk.commands.GTCommand.GTCommandResponseListener responseListener,
                 GTErrorListener errorListener)
        Sends the SET GID command to the goTenna. This GID will act as the goTenna's ID. Anyone wishing to communicate with this goTenna will need to send a message to this specific GID. Updates the UserDataStore with the user's new GID and username. Will create a new User if one does not exist already.
        Parameters:
        gid - The GID to assign to the goTenna.
        username - The name of the user who's GID this is.
        responseListener - The response listener callback for the command.
        errorListener - The error listener callback for the command.

      • deleteGID

        public void deleteGID(long gidToDelete,
             GTErrorListener errorListener)
        Deletes a GID from the goTenna's list of valid GIDs. Use this to delete a group GID you no longer want to receive messages from.
        Parameters:
        gidToDelete - The GID to delete.
        errorListener - The error listener callback for the command.

      • sendBroadcastMessage

        public void sendBroadcastMessage(byte[] outgoingData,
                        com.gotenna.sdk.commands.GTCommand.GTCommandResponseListener responseListener,
                        GTErrorListener errorListener)
        Sends a broadcast message out to every goTenna. A broadcast is also referred to as a SHOUT. This is because every nearby goTenna will received this message. Broadcast messages cannot be encrypted, their data is sent as plaintext.
        Parameters:
        outgoingData - The message's data, such as text, preferably formatted in some easily parse-able format.
        responseListener - The response listener callback for the command.
        errorListener - The error listener callback for the command.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(byte[] outgoingData,
               long receiverGID,
               com.gotenna.sdk.commands.GTCommand.GTCommandResponseListener responseListener,
               GTErrorListener errorListener,
               boolean willEncrypt)
        Sends a message out to a goTenna with the specified GID. Private and group messages may be encrypted if desired.
        Parameters:
        outgoingData - The message's data, such as text, preferably formatted in some easily parse-able format.
        receiverGID - The GID of the user who will receive this private message
        responseListener - The response listener callback for the command.
        errorListener - The error listener callback for the command.
        willEncrypt - Indicates whether the outgoingData will be encrypted or not using the SDK built in encryption system.

      • createGroupWithGIDs

        public long createGroupWithGIDs(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> groupMemberGIDs,
                       GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteResponseListener groupInviteResponseListener,
                       GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteErrorListener groupInviteErrorListener)
                         throws com.gotenna.sdk.exceptions.GTDataMissingException
        Creates a group using the listed group member GIDs. Group invitations are sent out to each member of the group individually. Will create a brand new group with a randomized GID for you.
        Parameters:
        groupMemberGIDs - The list of all members belonging to the group, including yourself.
        groupInviteResponseListener - The response listener callback for the group invitations.
        groupInviteErrorListener - The error listener callback for the group invitations
        Returns:
        The GID of the group that was created. Messages meant for the group should be sent to this GID.
        Throws:
        com.gotenna.sdk.exceptions.GTDataMissingException - Thrown if any required data is missing.

      • sendIndividualGroupInvite

        public void sendIndividualGroupInvite(long groupGID,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.Long> groupMemberGIDs,
                             long invitationReceiverGID,
                             GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteResponseListener groupInviteResponseListener,
                             GTCommandCenter.GTGroupInviteErrorListener groupInviteErrorListener)
                               throws com.gotenna.sdk.exceptions.GTDataMissingException
        Sends a group invitation to a specific individual group member.
        Parameters:
        groupGID - The GID of the group the individual should be invited to.
        groupMemberGIDs - The list of all members belonging to the group, including yourself and the individual.
        invitationReceiverGID - The GID of the individual who should receive the group invitation.
        groupInviteResponseListener - The response listener callback for the group invitations.
        groupInviteErrorListener - The error listener callback for the group invitations
        Throws:
        com.gotenna.sdk.exceptions.GTDataMissingException - Thrown if any required data is missing.

      • sendGetSystemInfo

        public void sendGetSystemInfo(GTCommandCenter.GTSystemInfoResponseListener systemInfoResponseListener,
                     GTErrorListener errorListener)
        Sends the GET SYSTEM INFO command to the connected goTenna. This retrieves important information about the goTenna, such as what version of the firmware the goTenna is currently running.
        Parameters:
        systemInfoResponseListener - The response listener callback that is invoked when the system info is received.
        errorListener - The error listener callback for the command.

      • sendStoreDateTimeEmergencyMessage

        public void sendStoreDateTimeEmergencyMessage(java.lang.String emergencyMessage)
        Sends a command to the goTenna to let it know what the current time is. Also sends a pre-formatted emergency message to be stored that contains the user's name and gps coordinates. This emergency message will be sent from the goTenna if the user taps the reset button on the goTenna 3 times. To update the user's gps coordinates for the emergency message, use UserDataStore.getCurrentUser() along with User.updateLocation(double, double, float, long) ) This command is automatically sent once every minute via GTStoreDateTimeEmergencyManager.
        Parameters:
        emergencyMessage - The emergency message to be displayed.

      • sendGetMessageRequest

        public void sendGetMessageRequest()
        Sends the GET command to retrieve any stored messages on the goTenna. DO NOT USE!!! Automatically called when a new messages on the goTenna is detected.

      • queueCommand

        public void queueCommand(com.gotenna.sdk.commands.GTCommand command)
        Queues up a command to be sent out. DO NOT USE!!!
        Parameters:
        command - The command to send out.

        Queues up a command to be sent out. DO NOT USE!!!
        Parameters:

        priority - The priority of the command.

      • queueCommands

                 int queuePriority)

        Parameters:

      • dispatchResponse

        public void dispatchResponse(byte[] responseDataChunks)
        Dispatched incoming data from the goTenna to be processed and parsed. DO NOT USE!!! Will be called automatically inside the SDK.
        Parameters:
        responseDataChunks - The data from a response to parse.
